meanings.definition: To extend equally or to the same point in space or time.
meanings.sent1: The two roads coextend all the way to the city center.
meanings.sent2: The river and the forest coextend for miles along the valley.
meanings.sent3: The race between the tortoise and the hare seemed to coextend endlessly.
meanings.sent4: Their friendship coextends like the branches of a sturdy tree.
meanings.sent5: The bond between siblings can coextend through thick and thin.

meanings.definition: To have the same range or scope.
meanings.sent1: The responsibilities of the job coextend to various departments.
meanings.sent2: The benefits of exercise coextend to both physical and mental health.
meanings.sent3: The cat's curiosity seemed to coextend to every corner of the house.
meanings.sent4: Her influence coextends across different social circles.
meanings.sent5: The impact of climate change coextends to all living beings on Earth.
